room_title: Escape room "The Pirate's Treasure" by Countdown Escape Room in Virginia Beach
room_address: 5764 Princess Anne Rd Virginia Beach, VA 23462
room_description: You and your crew have been forced to walk the plank and now reside at the bottom of the ocean, trapped aboard the cursed sunken ship of Captain Davy Jones for all eternity. Only one way to avoid this miserable fate - solve the clues to his treasure room and find the missing gem that will dis-spell this evil curse. Your 60-minute chance awaits you now - will you be able to reverse the curse and escape in time?
